abilities.name: Puretideâ€™s Teachings
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when it is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Way of the Short Blade
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.
